src:
Catat! Jajan Makan & Minum di Restoran Ini Cuma Rp11
07 Nov 2019, 22:25 by Faidah Umu Sofuroh - detikInet


Foto: Promo #Puas11Rupiah DANA bisa dinikmati masyarakat pada tanggal 8-11 November 2019. (Foto: dok. Faidah Umu Sofuroh/detikcom

Jakarta - Jelang perayaan Pesta DANA 11.11 tahun ini, DANA memberikan promo menarik kepada para penggunanya. Lewat program #Puas11Rupiah, DANA mengajak masyarakat Indonesia untuk merayakan momentum 11.11 secara khusus sebagai pesta ekonomi digital cara DANA."Kami menghadirkan program #Puas11Rupiah-mulai dari makan dan minum, isi pulsa, nonton bioskop, belanja di partner e-commerce DANA, itu semua serba Rp11," kata Senior Marketing Manager DANA, Lim Kusuma di Capital Place, Kamis (7/11/2019).Program ini dimulai secara simbolis dengan digelarnya Parade DANA 11.11 yang berlangsung saat car free day (CFD), Minggu (3/11/2019) dan Konvoi Mobil LED DANA 11.11 yang dilakukan hari ini (7/11/2019). Sedangkan untuk pengguna DANA dapat merasakan #Puas11Rupiah mulai 8-11 November 2019.Lewat program #Puas11Rupiah, pengguna dapat membeli voucher senilai Rp11 di aplikasi DANA. Jumlah maksimal voucher yang bisa dibeli adalah 3 voucher F&B dan satu voucher digital untuk pembelian pulsa, produk game, pembayaran tagihan atau pembelian tiket nonton di TIX ID.Beberapa merchant F&B yang bekerja sama dengan DANA antara lain KFC, CFC, CRUNCHÄUS SALADS, Cuppa Coffee, Hongkong Sheng Kee Dessert, Hongkong Sheng Kee Kitchen, Hop-Hop, Kedai Kopi Kulo, Mister Baso, Pho Street, Pho Street Kitchen, Rice Bowl, Tamani Café, dan Tamani Express.Ada juga Tamani Plus, The Halal Guys, Bakmi GM, Bari-Uma Ramen, Burger King, Burgreens, Burgreens Express, Caribou Coffee, Carl's Jr., Ce Wei, DairyQueen, Dapur Solo, Domino's Pizza, Fore Coffee, Ichiban sushi, Mama Tina, MammaMia, Negiya, Pezzo Pizza, Sapo Oriental, Senandung Alam, ShuShu, Solaria, Sugakiya, Ta Wan, Walao-eh, Wingstop, hingga Yoshinoya.Setelah membeli voucher, pengguna berkesempatan untuk memenangkan puluhan hadiah menarik yang akan dipilih melalui sistem undian. Adapun hadiah-hadiah yang bisa dimenangkan antara lain Samsung Note 10+, iPhone 11, Emas 10 gram, GoPro HERO7, iPad Mini, Tiket DWP, AirPods, Nintendo Switch, JBL Flip, Galaxy Buds, dan Saldo DANA."Bagi masyarakat yang menjadi konsumen dan pengguna DANA, #Puas11Rupiah menghadirkan nilai ekonomis sekaligus menjadi pintu masuk bagi mereka untuk mengeksplorasi beragam keunggulan dari dompet digital DANA dalam mendukung setiap transaksi," ujar Lim.Menurutnya, program ini juga memiliki manfaat kepada para pelaku usaha untuk meningkatkan transaksi dan mengenal lebih jauh lagi tentang kemampuan dompet digital DANA dalam memperkaya inovasi layanan bagi pelanggan. (ujm/ega)
text:
Note it! Eating & Drinking Snack at this restaurant is only Rp. 11
07 Nov 2019, 22:25 by Faidah Umu Sofuroh - detikInet


Photo: Promo # Puas11Ruta DANA can be enjoyed by the public on 8-11 November 2019. (Photo: doc. Faidah Umu Sofuroh / detikcom

Jakarta - Ahead of the 11.11 FUND Festivals celebration this year, DANA provides attractive promos to its users. Through the # Puas11R Rupiah program, DANA invites the Indonesian people to celebrate the 11.11 momentum specifically as a digital economy party in the DANA way. " all Rp11, "said DANA Senior Marketing Manager, Lim Kusuma at Capital Place, Thursday (11/07/2019). The program began symbolically with the holding of the 11.11 DANA Parade which took place during a car free day (CFD), Sunday (3 / 11/2019) and 11.11 FUND LED Car Convoy conducted today (7/11/2019). Whereas for DANA users can feel # Puas11Ruta from November 8-11 2019. Through the # Puas11Ruta program, users can buy vouchers worth Rp11 in the DANA application. The maximum number of vouchers that can be purchased are 3 F&B vouchers and one digital voucher to purchase credit, game products, bill payments or watch ticket purchases on TIX ID. Some F&B merchants that work with FUN include KFC, CFC, CRUNCHÄUS SALADS, Cuppa Coffee , Hongkong Sheng Kee Dessert, Hongkong Sheng Kee Kitchen, Hop-Hop, Kulo Coffee Shop, Mister Baso, Pho Street, Pho Street Kitchen, Rice Bowl, Tamani Café, and Tamani Express. There are also Tamani Plus, The Halal Guys, Bakmi GM , Bari-Uma Ramen, Burger King, Burgreens, Burgreens Express, Caribou Coffee, Carl's Jr., Ce Wei, DairyQueen, Solo Kitchen, Domino's Pizza, Fore Coffee, Ichiban sushi, Mama Tina, MammaMia, Negiya, Pezzo Pizza, Sapo Oriental , Natural Humor, ShuShu, Solaria, Sugakiya, Ta Wan, Walao-eh, Wingstop, to Yoshinoya. After purchasing vouchers, users have the opportunity to win dozens of attractive prizes that will be selected through a lottery system. The prizes that can be won include Samsung Note 10+, iPhone 11, 10 gram Gold, GoPro HERO7, iPad Mini, DWP Tickets, AirPods, Nintendo Switches, Flip JBL, Galaxy Buds, and Balance FUNDS. "For people who become consumers and users of DANA, # Puas11R Rupiah presents economic value as well as an entry point for them to explore the various advantages of DANA digital wallet in supporting each transaction, "Lim said. According to him, this program also has benefits for businesses to increase transactions and get to know more far more about the ability of the DANA digital wallet to enrich service innovation for customers. (ujm / ega)
